TEXT.TITLE: FIRST SAVINGS BANK FLORIDA <FSBF> SETS MEETING
TEXT.BODY: First Savings Bank of Florida said it expects a special shareholder meeting to be held around May 21 to consider the proposed merger into Gibraltar Financial Corp <GFC>. It said the annual meeting will be held April 30 to elect two directors and ratify the appointment of auditors. Reuter
